  • java.lang.Object
    • com.serfshack.jobwrangler.core.RunPolicy.Builder

    RunPolicy

    public static class RunPolicy.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class for creating new RunPolicy objects.

                                        java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Sets a static RetryDelay.
        Parameters:
        retryDelay - The time to wait after a failed attempt before initiating a new one.
        timeUnit - Units for timeout

      • withAttemptTimeout

        public RunPolicy.Builder withAttemptTimeout(long singleAttemptTimeout,
                                            java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Sets an attempt timeout.
        Parameters:
        singleAttemptTimeout - The maximum age for a single Attempt before it fails.
        timeUnit - Units for timeout
        Returns:
        this Builder for chaining

      • withInitialDelay

        public RunPolicy.Builder withInitialDelay(long initialDelay,
                                          java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Sets an initial delay before the Job proceeds to the READY state. Note this does not delay Job initialization or onAdded(), which always happen immediately on submit.
        Parameters:
        initialDelay - Minimum to wait before proceeding to the READY state.
        timeUnit - Units for initialDelay
        Returns:
        this Builder for chaining

      • withExponentialBackoff

        public RunPolicy.Builder withExponentialBackoff()
        Use a default exponential backoff strategy for retries with a random initial retry delay of 500-1500ms and a max retry delay of 30 seconds.
        Returns:
        this Builder for chaining

      • withExponentialBackoff

        public RunPolicy.Builder withExponentialBackoff(long initialRetryDelay,
                                                long maxRetryDelay,
                                                java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Use an exponential backoff strategy for retries with the specified initial and max retry delays. Each retry delay will be double the previous one.
        Parameters:
        initialRetryDelay - Initial retry delay
        maxRetryDelay - Maximum retry delay
        timeUnit - Units for delay params
        Returns:
        this Builder for chaining

      • withGatingCondition

        public RunPolicy.Builder withGatingCondition(GatingCondition gatingCondition)
        Assign a GatingCondition to the RunPolicy. May be called repeatedly to add multiple gating conditions. No attempt will be started and no retry logic comes into play until all GatingConditions are satisfied.
        Parameters:
        gatingCondition - a GatingCondition
        Returns:
        this Builder for chaining

      • withConcurrencyPolicy

        public RunPolicy.Builder withConcurrencyPolicy(AbstractConcurrencyPolicy concurrencyPolicy)
        Assign a ConcurrencyPolicy to the RunPolicy. Only one ConcurrencyPolicy may be associated with a RunPolicy. See FIFOPolicy, SingletonPolicyKeepExisting, SingletonPolicyReplaceExisting
        Parameters:
        concurrencyPolicy - a ConcurrencyPolicy
        Returns:
        this Builder for chaining

      • build

        public RunPolicy build()
        Get a new RunPolicy as configured in the Builder
        Returns:
        the RunPolicy
